name: Kelley Drye & Warren LLP
goal: Kelley, Drye & Warren LLP is an international law firm that assists and represents U.S. and international companies across a wide spectrum of legal specialties.  Its Brussels office advises and advocates on behalf of clients concerning EU policy and legislation and assists with regulatory compliance focusing primarily on food and drug, animal health and welfare, environmental matters, export controls/sanctions, mobility and consumer products. It also provides legal services concerning commercial, finance and corporate matters.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: The Brussels office monitors and engages on behalf of clients concerning EU policy, legislative and regulatory developments primarily in the areas of food and drug, animal health and welfare, environmental matters, export controls/sanctions, mobility and consumer products.
